extensionDescription.message: Select link text with easy mouse gestures.

options_selectGesture_horizontalSelect.message: Horizontal - Select text by dragging horizontally.

options_selectGesture_holdSelect.message: Hold - Select text by waiting for the hold time to elapse before dragging.

options_selectGesture_immediateSelect.message: Immediate - Select text by immediately dragging before the hold time elapses.
